resources.string: EARN points for every day you play and every dollar spent
REDEEM your points for valuable in-game currency!
Here\'s 500 points to get you started!
Something went wrong.\n\nPlease try again later.
You can always come back to your game later, but any unsaved progress may be lost.

With Kabam Rewards you earn points for simply playing any qualifying Kabam game each day or making purchases in any qualified Kabam game. Currently, the program is in beta. Your points can be redeemed for packages of in-game currency by going to the Redeem Points screen of any participating Kabam game. See the \"Participating Games\" FAQ for a list of games.

You earn points by playing games daily and by making purchases in participating Kabam Mobile games. \n\nEarn 5 points for every day that you play. Earn 10 points for every $1 (US Dollar) you spend on a purchase of in-game currency . We\'ll even give you DOUBLE POINTS on your first purchase as a Rewards Program member and on any purchase over $49.00.

string.name: kabam_soda_faq_question3
string.b: How do I redeem my points?

resources.string:
Your points can easily be redeemed for in-game currency by going to the Redeem Points screen. "Greyed-out" packages indicate that you do not have enough points to redeem that package. 

From the Redeem Points screen select the package you'd like to add. Once your in-game currency shows up in your game account, use it to wreak havoc on your enemies. 

Not enough points just yet? Don't worry, your points add up quickly, so be sure to check your balance often to see when it's time for you to redeem!

string.name: kabam_soda_faq_question4
string.b: Is there a place where I can make a suggestion or contact someone for help?

resources.string: If you are experiencing an issue with Kabam Rewards or would like to make a suggestion please [Contact us link]. We have created the program for you and would love to hear what you think about it!

string.name: kabam_soda_faq_question5
string.b: Why doesn\'t everyone have access to Kabam Rewards?

resources.string: The program is in Beta so that we can get valuable feedback from our players such as yourself and make the program even better. If you would like to make a suggestion please [Contact us link]

string.name: kabam_soda_faq_question6
string.b: Do my Kabam Rewards points expire?

resources.string: Points expire after your account has been inactive for a year.

string.name: kabam_soda_faq_question7
string.b: I just logged into a game or made a purchase, but I do not see my points yet - when will I get them?

resources.string: Please allow up to 24 hours for your points to be delivered to your account. If it\'s been over 24 hours and you have not received your points please let us know by [Contact us link]
Log in to your account to redeem rewards.
